description: Add support for targeting specific packages in uninstall, update, and upgrade commands without requiring resource type specification

userStories.title: Add package argument parsing to uninstall command
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to uninstall specific packages without affecting other installed packages.
acceptanceCriteria: Parse zero or more package arguments in uninstall command
Zero arguments maintains current behavior (all packages)
Package format is registry/package
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement filtered uninstall logic
userStories.description: As a developer, I want uninstall to only remove specified packages.
acceptanceCriteria: Lookup packages in manifest to determine type
Uninstall only specified packages from sinks
Remove only specified packages from manifest
Warn if package not found, continue with others
Exit code 0 if at least one succeeds, 1 if all fail
Typecheck passes
Tests pass

userStories.title: Add package argument parsing to update command
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to update specific packages to their latest compatible versions.
acceptanceCriteria: Parse zero or more package arguments in update command
Zero arguments maintains current behavior (all packages)
Package format is registry/package
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement filtered update logic
userStories.description: As a developer, I want update to only affect specified packages.
acceptanceCriteria: Lookup packages in manifest to determine type
Update only specified packages
Respect version constraints
Warn if package not found, continue with others
Exit code 0 if at least one succeeds, 1 if all fail
Typecheck passes
Tests pass

userStories.title: Add package argument parsing to upgrade command
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to upgrade specific packages to their absolute latest versions.
acceptanceCriteria: Parse zero or more package arguments in upgrade command
Zero arguments maintains current behavior (all packages)
Package format is registry/package
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement filtered upgrade logic
userStories.description: As a developer, I want upgrade to only affect specified packages.
acceptanceCriteria: Lookup packages in manifest to determine type
Upgrade only specified packages
Ignore version constraints
Update constraint to ^X.0.0 based on new version
Warn if package not found, continue with others
Exit code 0 if at least one succeeds, 1 if all fail
Typecheck passes
Tests pass
